message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $11,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for the product. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
